word_mean: 锕：铀矿中的稀有金属化学元素，具放射性，原子序数89，原子量227，化学符号Ac

sentence.Network_en: Any of a series of chemically similar, radioactive elements with atomic numbers ranging from 89 ( actinium ) through 103 ( lawrencium ).
sentence.Network_cn: 锕类任何化学性质相似, 原子序数在89 ( 锕 ) 与103 ( 铹 ) 之间变化的放射性元素.

sentence.Network_en: The extraction mechanism and separation process of lanthanum and actinium were studied in HDEHP ( kerosene ) NO 3 system.
sentence.Network_cn: 本文研究了在HNO_3体系中,P_ ( 204 ) 萃取La和 Ac的 机理及影响La, Ac萃 取分离因素,给出了La, Ac分配的数学摸型.

sentence.Network_en: The extraction mechanism and separation process of lanthanum and actinium were studied in HDEHP ( kerosene ) - HNO 3 system.
sentence.Network_cn: 研究了在HNO_ 3体系中,P_ ( 204 ) 萃取La和 Ac的 机理及影响La, Ac萃取分离因素,给出了La, Ac分配的数学模型.
